JUSTICE SUNIL THOMAS FRIDAY, THE 13TH DAY OF JANUARY 2017/23RD POUSHA, 1938 Cr1.MC.No. 292 of 2017 () L.P.94/2012 IN C.P.44/2011 ON the FILE OF JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT, MALAPPURAM CRIME NO.237/2010 OF VAZHAKKAD POLICE STATION PETITIONER/5TH ACCUSED: THATTANCHERI ABDURASAK AGED:47 YEARS, S/O AHAMADKUTTY, CHEEDIKKUZHI HOUSE, KUNNATHADAYI, EDAVANNAPPARA, VAZHAKKAD, MALAPPURAM DISTRICT BY ADVS.SRI.P.SAMSUDIN SRI.K.C.ANTONY MATHEW SRI.JITHIN LUKOSE KUM.ANJU CLETUS RESPONDENT (S) /STATE: STATE OF KERALA REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA ERNAKULAM-682031 R BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR:SRI T R RANJITH THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING BEEN FINALLY HEARD ON 13-01-2017, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Pletal ee We F oo Dk an 2017/KER/2062 Cr1.MC.No. 292 of 2017 () APPENDIX PETITIONER (S)' EXHIBITS ANNEXURE Al TRUE COPY OF THE FIR AND FINAL REPORT IN CRIME NO. 237/2010 OF VAZHAKKAD POLICE STATION ANNEXURE A2 TRUE COPY OF THE GOVERNMENT ORDER NO. 50882/L4/11/HOME DATED 2/1/2012 ANNEXURE A3 TRUE COPY OF THE PETITION U/S 321 DATED 18/10/2012 ANNEXURE A4 TRUE COPY OF THE JUDGMENT IN SC 375/2011 OF THE ADDL. SESSIONS COURT-(ADHOC-I) , MANJERI RESPONDENT (S)' EXHIBITS:NIL True Copy / PA to Judge 2017/KER/2062 SUNIL THOMAS, J. Crl.M.C.No.292 of 2017 Dated this the 13 day of January, 2017 ORDER Petitioner herein is the 5" accused in a proceeding arising from Crime No.237 of 2010 of Vazhakkad Police Station for offences punishable under sections 143, 147, 148, 450, 436, 427 r/ 149 of Indian Penal Code. 2. The matter was pending as S.C.No.375 of 2011 before the Additional Sessions Court, Adhoc-I, Manjeri. Pending the proceedings, Annexure-A2 order was issued by the Government permitting withdrawal of the case with the permission of the Court. Consequently, Annexure-A3 application was submitted by the Additional Public Prosecutor and by order in Crl.M.P.No.1504 of 2012 in the above sessions case, all the accused who faced the trial were discharged. Petitioner herein and the other accused who did not participate were left out. Case of the petitioner herein is now pending as L.P.No.94 of 2012 in C.P.No.44 of 2011. 3. Having considered the fact that Annexure-A4 judgment has become final and conclusive and the Government order produced as Annexure-A4 is in relation to the withdrawal of the case Plies P ine Bea 2017/KER/2062 Crl.M.C.292/17 2 as such, necessarily, it should enure to the benefit of the petitioner herein who also stood as accused, though had not participated in S.C.No.375 of 2011. Having regard to these facts, I feel that no purpose will be served by prosecuting the petitioner herein since all other main accused remain discharged. In the light of above, I am inclined to quash the criminal proceedings. In the result, Crl.M.C is allowed. All further proceedings arising from Crime No.237 of 2010 of Vazhakkad Police Station stand quashed. Sd/- SUNIL THOMAS Judge Sbna/13/1/17 True Copy / P A to Judge
